title: "Pony.ai to start driverless tests on public roads in Beijing"
excerpt: "Silicon Valley-based autonomous driving company Pony.ai has been authorized to conduct driverless tests on public roads in Beijing. The company is one of the two autonomous software companies (along with Baidu) to receive this important Beijing permit."
